title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.9 - Compliance with orders, signals, directions and signs required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.9 - Compliance with orders, signals, directions and signs required

State Regulations

Anything herein contained to the contrary notwithstanding, traffic must at all times comply with any lawful order, signal or direction, by
voice or hand, of any employee of the commission. When traffic is controlled by
signs or mechanical or electrical signals, such signs and signals shall be
obeyed unless an employee of the commission directs
otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
